short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace new tab page with a minimal dashboard which displays the time and any sentence the user wants.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a minimal new tab extension which displays the current time. 

You can customise by: 

Double clicking the text to write your own messge.

Double clicking the background to see background and text colour settings.
